snippet: The Comedy Awards, on Comedy Central, are more irreverent than most awards shows, but tastefulness still interferes.
abstract: Jason Zinoman observes that the Comedy Awards show on Comedy Central is more irreverent and entertaining to watch than most award shows, but its attempt at tastefulness prevents it from being truly exciting.
lead_paragraph: The Comedy Awards, on Comedy Central, are more irreverent than most awards shows, but tastefulness still interferes.

headline.seo: The Comedy Awards on Comedy Central
headline.main: Finding the Humor in Giving Out Comedy Awards
headline.print_headline: Finding the Humor in Giving Out Comedy Awards
